title: Elastic Agent Helm chart configuration.
description: Schema for managing the Elastic Agent Helm chart values.

output.description: Name of the output used in system integration. Must be defined in outputs.
Name of the output used in Kubernetes integration. Must be defined in outputs.

enabled.description: Enable state streams based on kube-state-metrics.

deployKSM.description: Deploy kube-state-metrics service as a sidecar container.

host.description: Host of the kube-state-metrics service, used when deployKSM is set to false.

enabled.description: Enable metric streams based on kubelet.

engine.description: Engine to use for Kubernetes manifests or ECK CRDs.

kibanaHost.description: Kibana host to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

kibanaUser.description: Kibana username to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

kibanaPassword.description: Kibana password to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

presets.description: Map of deployment presets for the Elastic Agent.

OutputObject.description: Defines the configuration for an output.

url.description: URL of the output (required for ESPlainAuthBasic and ESPlainAuthAPI type).

username.description: Username to authenticate with the output (required for ESPlainAuthBasic).

password.description: Password to authenticate with the output (required for ESPlainAuthBasic).

api_key.description: API key to authenticate with the output (required for ESPlainAuthAPI type).

secretName.description: K8s secret to mount output connection details (required for ESSecretAuthBasic and ESSecretAuthAPI types).

name.description: Name to reference an Elasticsearch cluster managed by ECK (required for ESECKRef type).

namespace.description: Namespace to reference an Elasticsearch cluster managed by ECK (optional for ESECKRef type).

preset.description: Agent preset that this integration runs on.

use_output.description: Name of the output to use.

kibanaHost.description: Kibana host to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

kibanaUser.description: Kibana username to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

kibanaPassword.description: Kibana password to fallback if enrollment token is not supplied.

hostNetwork.description: Enable host networking for the deployment.

hostPID.description: Enable host PID namespace for the deployment.

resources.description: Resource limits and requests for the deployment.

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology spread constraints for the deployment.

extraEnvs.description: Extra environment variables for the deployment.

extraVolumeMounts.description: Extra volume mounts for the deployment.

name.description: Name of the cluster role to use if create is set to false.

annotations.description: Annotations for the cluster role if create is set to true.

rules.description: Rules for the cluster role to create if create is set to true.

name.description: Name of the service account to use if create is set to false.

annotations.description: Annotations for the service account if create is set to true.

processors.description: Processors for the system auth logs stream.

ignore_older.description: If this option is specified, events that are older than the specified amount of time are ignored. Valid time units are "ns", "us" (or "s"), "ms", "s", "m", "h".
